name: Edimax EW-7612PIn 802.11a/b/g/n PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Security:
64/128 bit WEP Encryption and WPA-PSK
WPA2-PSK and WPS security
Features: [Supports up to 300 Mbps 802.11n Wireless data rate – the latest wireless standard. Permitting users to have the farthest range with the widest coverage. (Up to 12 times the speed and 5 times the coverage of 802.11b.), Supports WMM (Wi-Fi Multimedia) Standard so that you can let different types of data to have higher priority. It allows better streaming of real-time data such as Video, Music, Skype…etc ., The included 16-language EZmax setup wizard and friendly UI will walk you through configuring EW-7612PIn to your wireless network., Provides Green functions to reduce electrical power wasted during idle time.]
